title: Bug 113047 - No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. Use a new data source that has no database/table/column information. Actual result: When changing the data source, there is no listing of children nodes in the data set editor page of the query tab. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
